name: Lambo Speed: Drift X
description:
Lambo Speed: Drift X!!
Fulfill your drifting passion in this new Lambo car model to rule the drifting world and walk freely in your fast track racing car. Experience new in-vehicle controls and touch steering to enjoy the best driving experience.
Features!

- Lamborghini Veneno Roadster and other Multiple Luxury Cars
- Free driving mode and Smooth controls
- Drifting physics with High quality graphics
- Rear Camera view in racing mode
- Exciting 4 wheel drive
- Racing fights in modern racing dynamics with deadly drift
